author: __flcl
content:
Some early ideas around  `eth_gasPrices/eth_feeHistory`  - API, price estimation + prototype.

It's about exposing information about blob gas price via `eth_` endpoints.
https://hackmd.io/hwscuUSBQaGAfa3dbYt9zA
The API is just an idea and a subject to change, feedback is highly appreciated!
